comment.author: 40012624@N02
comment._content:
Not at all a representative picture of a Sinhalese woman. The attire is not Sinhalese at all.  Looks more like the attire of South Indian tribal women. 

Julia Margaret Cameron was known to dress up people in different attires and pose them to illustrate poetic or biblical themes with a psychological dimension. Cameron’s images were created as works of art rather than as documentary records.

comment._content:
